namespace Utility
{
  namespace ExH
  {
    namespace System
    {
      // This is the only way to make predefined exceptions like
      // std::bad_alloc, etc to appear in the right place of the hierarchy.
      //

      typedef std::exception Exception;
    }
  }
}
